abstract: Community Health Advocates, program run by Community Service Society of New York, one of eight agencies supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Patricia Lewis pay for medical expenses and groceries while she fights breast cancer.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Community Service Society of New York
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Patricia Lewis, 68, is focused on enjoying her grandchildren after losing her health and career to breast cancer.
snippet: Patricia Lewis, 68, is focused on enjoying her grandchildren after losing her health and career to breast cancer....

headline.main: As She Fights Cancer, a Woman Strives for Normalcy
headline.print_headline: Striving for Normalcy While Fighting Cancer
